scripts.update-styles: curl -s https://play.battlesnake.com/references/customizations/ | grep -oP '(?<=<small>)[a-zA-Z-]+(?=</small>)' | sort | uniq | xargs -I {} bash -c 'curl -sf https://media.battlesnake.com/snakes/heads/{}.svg?board_version=1.0.38 -o src/assets/snakes/heads/{}.svg & curl -sf https://media.battlesnake.com/snakes/tails/{}.svg?board_version=1.0.38 -o src/assets/snakes/tails/{}.svg'
scripts.update-arena: mkdir -p public/data; node scripts/parse-arena.mjs https://play.battlesnake.com/arena/global/ > public/data/global-arena.json & node scripts/parse-arena.mjs https://play.battlesnake.com/arena/global-duels/ > public/data/global-duels.json & node scripts/parse-arena.mjs https://play.battlesnake.com/arena/global-royale/ > public/data/global-royale.json
